attributes.action: Make St. Georges Day a national public holiday.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's time to unite as one and claim what is rightfully ours. A national holiday to celebrate our heritage just like many other countries do. Even if you are not English by birth, by living and working in this great country, you are part of the fibre that keeps us going. Sign the petition and make a difference. This will be a celebration for all of us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
